resources.string: What is the name of your company?\nBioMotive is the name of the company, a portmanteau of biopotential and motive meaning motion through biopotential
What is the name of your project?\nBioPIn, it means Biopotential Integration. It aims to motorized manual wheelchairs through an attachment kit.

How the application works?\nThe application takes GPS data from a BioPin unit and tracks it using the GooglePlay Services, specifically Google Maps. Each time a unit, it creates a log in which can be viewed in the logs menu where the user can either update the information, add remarks to each logged item, and/or delete it.
A member of BioMotive and is currently a 4th year Computer Engineering student at Technological Institute of the Philippines - Quezon City.
